#summary Rule Functions > Name

= name( arg1, ..., argN ) =

Checks if any of the supplied arguments are contained within the item's name

== Arguments ==

  * arg1...N (string) = pattern to search for

== Remarks ==

  * [StringMatching string patterns] can be used

== Examples ==

{{{
name( "elixir", "potion" )
}}}

{{{
name( "scroll of" )
}}}
